_header: With a sorrow and a clout
_description: One couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
With a sorwe & a clutAl þis werd comet in &
                    out
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 24.
